data.prayer: Father, we ask for 100 new simple churches in the state of Ben Arous (Tunis Sud), Tunisia. Place a simple church in every community of the 501,900 people living here.
data.verse: And blessed be His glorious name forever; And may the whole earth be filled with His glory. Amen, and Amen.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ben Arous (Tunis Sud), Tunisia
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 149 believers in Ben Arous (Tunis Sud) against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.
Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Ben Arous (Tunis Sud), Tunisia.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Ben Arous (Tunis Sud). Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Bedouin, Rabiya people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Lord, help the people of Ben Arous (Tunis Sud), Tunisia to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.
Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 499,647 who are far from you in Ben Arous (Tunis Sud), Tunisia from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.section_summary:
the state of Ben Arous (Tunis Sud), Tunisia has a population of 501,900.

We estimate Ben Arous (Tunis Sud) has 149 people who might know Jesus, 2,104 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 499,647 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3,368 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, answer the requests of your people in the state of Ben Arous (Tunis Sud).
data.verse: This is the boldness which we have toward him, that, if we ask anything according to his will, he listens to us.
